info.description:
# activiti 

- Activiti is battle-tested Business Process Management. Organizations across the world depend on the open source platform in a huge range of demanding situations. It supports open standards with BPMN and DMN so you can create processes that suit you.
info.title: Activiti App REST API

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The value contains: idDesc, idAsc, emailAsc, emailDesc.

get.summary: Check if the user is authenticated

200.description: Indicates the user is authenticated, and return its full name

401.description: Indicates the requested did not contain valid authorization.

post.summary: Create temporary raw related content text

get.summary: Get related process instance for content
Get models to include in app definition

400.description: Model with provided key already exists.

Get process model history json definitions
Get model json for process definition
Get related content for process instance

Create related content on process instance

get.summary: Get bpmn node json stencil definitions

post.summary: Create related content on task text

404.description: Indicates the requested user does not exist.
